userClippingsRoot.name: Imported clipping 2 (2 paragraphs of lorem ipsum)
userClippingsRoot.content:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. In blandit est sed ex lacinia, eget ultricies arcu consectetur. Cras vel tortor sit amet sem iaculis eleifend. Proin rutrum, lectus ac eleifend ornare, justo tortor pharetra purus, id tempus nulla elit at ipsum. Nulla eleifend leo justo, at posuere mi venenatis id. Morbi placerat, odio eget consequat placerat, neque nisl posuere ex, a finibus ligula ligula eget sapien. Nulla eget sollicitudin ante. Sed gravida arcu at est posuere efficitur. Duis laoreet rhoncus velit, sed faucibus justo suscipit nec. Duis eu tincidunt neque.

Pellentesque neque augue, facilisis consectetur condimentum at, condimentum a lorem. Nam vel feugiat ante. Proin sit amet odio nisi. Praesent sit amet semper nibh. Aenean ac tellus ultricies, ultricies nibh eget, ultrices nulla. Aliquam eget facilisis leo. Sed dictum lacus eu libero vulputate lacinia.

children.name: Clippings description from AMO (with all clipping properties)
children.content: Saves and manages frequently-entered text for later pasting into web page forms in Firefox or email and newsgroup messages in Thunderbird. Pasting a clipping is accomplished with just two mouse clicks, eliminating the hassle of retyping or repetitive copying and pasting.
children.label: blue

children.name: Clippings Manager welcome
children.content:
Use Clippings Manager to edit, rename or delete clippings, or organize your clippings collection into folders.
You can also import or export your clippings from Clippings Manager.

children.name: Clipping without the 'label' property
children.content: Labels were introduced in version 5.0; therefore, data sources created beforehand didn't have the 'label' property.
